header.title: Quick Appointment Booking Guide
header.description: Experience optimal healthcare service and book appointments easily and quickly

step1.title: Select Appointment Information
items: Log in to the software on web or mobile app
Choose Booking at facility or Booking by doctor
Select appointment details: Specialty, doctor, date, time and insurance status
Enter patient information: Choose existing profile or create new one

step2.title: SELECT/CREATE PATIENT PROFILE (You can create up to 10 profiles)
items: Method 2: If previously visited the hospital, enter medical record number

Method 3: For first-time visits, register new profile (enter full information: Full name; Date of birth; Gender; Health insurance number; ID/Passport; Ethnicity; Occupation; Phone number; Email; Address)

step3.title: PAY EXAMINATION FEE
items: Choose payment method: QR code, 24/7 bank transfer, Medical card, International payment card or domestic ATM card or E-wallet
Review payment information (examination fee, service fee and total amount) and Confirm payment
Complete payment via E-wallet or Banking App or Payment Gateway

step4.title: RECEIVE ELECTRONIC MEDICAL SLIP
items: After successful payment, you will immediately receive an electronic medical slip on the app (and via email). If booking through Hotline 19002115, please check the medical slip sent via SMS

examination.title: Examination and Clinical Tests
items: On the appointment date, please go directly to the clinic or reception desk as instructed on the medical slip
Patients will receive clinical examination according to Hospital procedures
If clinical tests are prescribed by the doctor, patients can pay fees online or at the hospital's cashier and proceed to the clinical testing room
Patients return to the initial examination room, after receiving all clinical test results, for doctor's examination, consultation and results (prescription, follow-up appointment,...)
